author: Nintendo of America
description:
The new Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion Expansion Pack: Into the Abyss is out now on Nintendo Switch 2: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/daemon-x-machina-titanic-scion-into-the-abyss-70050000058250-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01

Head "Into the Abyss" and explore the Survey Zone: Locus Initi, a dangerous new location surrounding the Genesis Tree. There you'll find threatening Femto-powered enemies, a new Axiom base to challenge, and earn powerful rewards that will help you take on this all-new storyline. 

#DaemonxMachina #NintendoSwitch2  

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion – Into the Abyss – Nintendo Switch 2

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Goodnight Universe is now available on Nintendo Switch 2: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/goodnight-universe-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01

The next game from the critically acclaimed studio behind Before Your Eyes is here! In Goodnight Universe, you are a 6-month-old baby developing mysterious psychic powers. What you want most is to be loved and accepted by your family, but a secretive tech corporation wants you for their own. 

#NintendoSwitch2 #GoodnightUniverse 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

title: Goodnight Universe – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2
